entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:37 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 01:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.8°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
